snippet.title: PigShip and the Giant Wolf - Release Date Trailer - Nintendo Switch and PS5
snippet.description:
Pigship and the Giant Wolf is coming to Nintendo Switch and Playstation 5 on May 20! :)

You will help to a little piggy to save his brothers of the claws of the Wolf Army and defeat them. Are you ready for some classic Shoot'em Up action? 

With online ranking chart to compare your best times with friends and players from all over the world.
 
Features_______________________________
- Classic arcade with a beautiful pixel art.
- 6 Stages full of enemies and giant bosses.
- 3 shooting types.
- Ranking online on Bones Mode.
- Level up system on Normal Mode.
